title: Program Validation Response Schema
description: Defines the validation results returned by the program when requested for program requirements

validationResults.title: Validation Results
validationResults.description: A list of errors or success messages in response to validating the requirements

key.title: Requirement Key
key.description: The key of the requirement associated with the listed validation results

results.title: Requirement Validation Results
results.description: The results associated with the validation requirement key

validationResult.title: Requirement Validation Result
validationResult.description: A result of validating a requirement

status.title: Validation Status
status.description: A status indicating whether the validation was successful or the severity of the error

message.title: Message
message.description: A message indicating why the validation was successful or not

longDescription.title: Long Description
longDescription.description: A more detailed description of why the validation was not successful and what can be done to resolve it
